column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////BabaReeba was excellent. This was our first time here so we didn't know reservations were a must. We were told there would be a 2hr wait
column2: ugh. But we were able to snag seats at 1 of the 2 bars in a matter of minutes and just ate and drank there. Our bartender was very attentive and courteous. The food was all great as well. We had bacon wrapped dates
column4: shrimp. The sangria was awesome as well. I highly recommend BabaReeba
column5: just be sure to make reservations.
